body_html: I'm new to Tensorflow, so I'm not sure what the best approach would be to go from here but in your opinion would it be reasonable to modify the set input_op_fn as an unpack? Maybe read in the input tensor and guess the direction of the unpack/slice? Or just remove the default and force people to provide an input function?

body: I'm new to Tensorflow, so I'm not sure what the best approach would be to go from here but in your opinion would it be reasonable to modify the set input_op_fn as an unpack?  Maybe read in the input tensor and guess the direction of the unpack/slice? Or just remove the default and force people to provide an input function?
